message: https://bitbucket.org/anateus/convoreding/src
It's windows only for now
As per readme TODO includes: OSX compat, visual notification, rudimentary reminder intelligence
will make it OSX compat some time tonight
And for those wondering the "point" is for when your browser isn't open, or your browser is muted, and soon, to have a visual notification without using a browser extension.
Thoughts, comments, complaints, appreciated
now detects osx, and displays a visual notification on both windows and osx
could use some OSX testers
(using osascript on macos)
